Adapting Dynamic Classifier Selection for Concept Drift. ESWA, 2018. (pdf). Google Scholar I am a researcher at the Data Science & Big Data research group. The Laboratory of Data Science & Big Data was created in 2018 and it is part of the Department of Informatics (DInf) and Department of Statistics (DEst) of the Federal University of Parana (UFPR). We are currently accepting master's and PhD students. Check out more here. Open Source Projects I will always try my best to keep my projects Open Source. Check my GitHub. GitHub Teaching C++ Object-Oriented Programming in C++. Designing for performance. Assembly Low-level programming. I mean, really low level ...
